summary: This bill, H.R. 2429, directs the Secretary of Transportation to develop and implement a 10-year Campus Modernization Plan for the United States Merchant Marine Academy. The plan aims to modernize infrastructure and facilities to improve training and education for future merchant mariners. It involves constructing and renovating facilities, upgrading technology, and addressing infrastructure needs. The bill authorizes $1.02 billion in appropriations from the Maritime Security Trust Fund between fiscal years 2026 and 2035.
